nodes.text: Pink Squadron was a starfighter squadron of the New Republic's Starfighter Corps. The squadron was active in the time following the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. All official New Republic records of Pink Squadron's operations were either classified or redacted. The squadron's starfighters were marked with pink stripes.
Pink Squadron was mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, in which the squadron's colors can be applied to the player's New Republic starfighters in the game's multiplayer mode.
